response.overview: "Ethan Astor is a famous photographer from Ittosiviik, Alaska. On December 5th, 1986, his wife, Martha Astor, reported that her husband was showing a strange obsession with circles. He would constantly draw the shapes on the walls of their basement. He would also refuse to eat, sleep or talk to Martha. But Ethan wasn't the only one dealing with such obsession. Many citizens from Ittosiviik started to show the same obsession with circles around the same time. The government issued an emergency evacuation for Ittosiviik a day before this strange incident. All of Ittosiviik's citizens evacuated except for the obsessed ones. Martha returned to Ittosiviik days later, only to find out that her husband, along with the dozens of other people who decided to stay, was gone."
response.title: The circles-VHS TALES
